content:
- 'Description': Provides education and instruction on ethical issues and
    behavior in the workplace.
  'Id': fa35e9cf3c5f4b91bb558c5cc1da41
  'Name': Ethics Training
  'Slot':
  - 'Attribute-Description': The type of ethics training to attend.
    'Attribute-Identifier': 7895d286836d4c7eb8167dcc8c7017
    'Name': training_type
    'Attribute-Possible-values':
    - online
    - in-person
    - workshop
  - 'Attribute-Description': The specific ethics topic to cover in the training.
    'Attribute-Identifier': 0bf6cf79b47144adb4a8aed6e39936
    'Name': topic
  - 'Attribute-Description': The length of the training session.
    'Attribute-Identifier': de8e493d47a74036a2cfbd60cddf23
    'Name': duration
  - 'Attribute-Description': The name of the ethics training instructor.
    'Attribute-Identifier': 7aeefdd0666d4599a6247bfbc1174d
    'Name': instructor
- 'Description': Educates employees on laws, regulations, and company policies
    that must be followed in the workplace.
  'Id': 55756079eb5549509e279f48c2fdb7
  'Name': Compliance Training
  'Slot':
  - 'Attribute-Description': The type of compliance training required.
    'Attribute-Identifier': b61e0bcbeaa24d539a73a261eed064
    'Name': training_type
    'Attribute-Possible-values':
    - data_privacy
    - anti_harassment
    - code_of_conduct
    - health_and_safety
  - 'Attribute-Description': The department that needs the training.
    'Attribute-Identifier': 35c86ef302f24457aad1d254848564
    'Name': department
  - 'Attribute-Description': The employee role that needs the training.
    'Attribute-Identifier': 2d84c973212c4aeaa9821242c20abd
    'Name': employee_role
  - 'Attribute-Description': The language for the training.
    'Attribute-Identifier': a2e8304592e64d3ba2d43440437ae3
    'Name': language
- 'Description': Involves learning and improving new or existing abilities
    that can be applied in a professional setting.
  'Id': 406ec4f27b434665883f123dd1b6b3
  'Name': Skills Development
  'Slot':
  - 'Attribute-Description': The specific skill the training is focused on.
    'Attribute-Identifier': 1189a6facb604680a6c3893417d1ce
    'Name': skill
    'Attribute-Possible-values':
    - communication
    - leadership
    - time management
    - problem solving
    - team building
    - project management
    - negotiation
    - presentation
    - sales
    - customer service
  - 'Attribute-Description': The format of the training.
    'Attribute-Identifier': 8dd4af4b4be640058950c9727569a8
    'Name': training_type
  - 'Attribute-Description': The length of the training.
    'Attribute-Identifier': fa1676d3447e4547861ee2752fde6b
    'Name': duration
    'Attribute-Possible-values':
    - 1 day
    - 2 days
    - 1 week
    - 2 weeks
    - 1 month
    - 3 months
    - 6 months
    - 1 year
  - 'Attribute-Description': The organization or individual providing the training.
    'Attribute-Identifier': c950ff8c86e84844ba7948a28297d0
    'Name': training_provider
- 'Description': Describes the process of moving up the career ladder to
    a higher-level position.
  'Id': a61651e79c95473fb3bcbbd0b7d16f
  'Name': Career Advancement
  'Slot':
  - 'Attribute-Description': The type of training to take for career advancement.
    'Attribute-Identifier': bcc4025822c14be19f0092065d6948
    'Name': training_type
    'Attribute-Possible-values':
    - technical_skills
    - leadership_skills
    - project_management
    - communication_skills
    - sales_training
    - customer_service
    - computer_skills
    - data_analysis
  - 'Attribute-Description': The industry for which the training is intended.
    'Attribute-Identifier': 86890e45bc7d461c943a88164a7cdf
    'Name': industry
  - 'Attribute-Description': The level of training required for career advancement.
    'Attribute-Identifier': 8ab353d7c71640e3979d907620f710
    'Name': level
  - 'Attribute-Description': The duration of the training program.
    'Attribute-Identifier': c4426ae18abb419d860329d33e9f65
    'Name': duration

Classify the provided text based on the schema above. The schema contains descriptions, IDs and names for intents and nested under the intents, contains slots/attributes with descriptions, IDs, Names, and some other specifications. Give a YAML in the same general structure as the input. For example:

ID:
 -entityID : entityvalue
- entityID : entityvalue

If no intent matches the intents provided in the schema, output None. If an entity specifies possible values, the possible values are an exhaustive list and valid entities cannot deviate. 

You are going to output the intent(s) and entiti(es) in the following text:

Sales team assigned mandatory compliance training in data security

rejected:
intent: Compliance Training
entities:
  training_type: data_security
  department: Sales team
